hero.title: Forged in
hero.subtitle: Experience authentic Muay Thai at
hero.subtitleEnd: Located in the heart of Sukhumvit.

philosophy.label: Sticky Rice Philosophy
philosophy.title: Eat Rice.
philosophy.description: "Sticky Rice" represents the bond of our community—we stick together. Our training is intense, authentic, and designed to build fighters from the ground up.

about.label: The Gym
about.title: Bangkok's Premier
about.descriptionEnd: , we bring the authentic stadium experience to a modern facility. Whether you are training for fitness or your next professional fight, our Kru will push you to your limits.

eliteTrainers.title: Elite Trainers
eliteTrainers.description: Learn from former Rajadamnern and Lumpinee stadium champions with over 200+ fights.

realTechnique.title: Real Technique
realTechnique.description: We teach "Muay Femur" (technician) and "Muay Khao" (knee fighter) styles. Correct form is priority.

premiumFacility.title: Premium Facility
premiumFacility.description: Air-conditioned strength zone, clean mats, and premium Fairtex equipment.

fighterVisaLiving.title: Fighter Visa
fighterVisaLiving.description: Looking to stay long term? We provide ED Visa support for 6-12 months and have partner accommodation just 5 minutes walk from Sticky Rice Fight Gym.

testimonials.title: Fighter
testimonials.subtitle: From around the world to Bangkok.
